page.title: 15Rothwell Moto-Cross Track
page.content: The{Rothwell Moto-Cross Track}is situated next to{Rothwell Colliery}on the pit hills (black and grey shale). It is used mostly by amateurs. The people who go set a day and plan a meeting with a whole range of motorbikes, from 80 to 500 cc. A lot of the beginners go on trial bikes{(DT {175}or even{Honda C50). There are some very tough courses or tracks, which are very dangerous. Sometimes people are injured. There are lots of high, steep, thin hills: with a wide gauge of tyres you have to go up fast and straight. Sometimes it can be a family affair, with the fathers and sons going together. A second-hand{Moto-Cross}bike can cost from Â£200 to Â£1000. A new one will cost between Â£1100 and Â£2100.
